headline: Capital One and Discover Announce Special Meetings of Stockholders to Be Held on February 18, 2025
summary: MCLEAN, Va. & RIVERWOODS, Ill., December 17, 2024--Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE: COF) and Discover Financial Services (NYSE: DFS) today announced that each company intends to hold a special meeting of stockholders on February 18, 2025 for the companies’ respective common stockholders to consider and vote on Capital One’s acquisition of Discover and related matters.

headline: His Startup Is Now Worth $62 Billion. It Gave Away Its First Product Free.
summary: As CEO of Databricks, Ali Ghodsi has performed a series of ‘strategic surgeries’ to make his company one of the fastest-growing startups in Silicon Valley.
